headline: In Ukraine, Biden faces a crisis with little political benefit back home
sentences: A Russian invasion of Ukraine  would be likely to drive up gas prices amid the highest inflation in decades, wipe out significant gains in the stock market and give Republicans a new line of attack to argue against Bidens foreign policy acumen  putting an already unpopular presidency on even shakier ground with voters heading into the fall midterm elections, Democratic strategists and pollsters said,? NBCs Shannon Pettypiece, Scott Wong and Peter Nicholas write.
